content.rendered:
Podcasting

Elevate the listening experience

Help podcast, radio show, and online content creators achieve consistent and professional-sounding audio results with the Dolby.io APIs.

START BUILDING FOR FREE
Contact sales

Trusted by our customers

Make your podcasts and content stand out

Make content stand out from the crowd by giving it greater audio impact. With a simple API call, you can remove background noise, improve dialog clarity, and reduce listener fatigue. The Dolby.io APIs enhance media content to give listeners a differentiated experience with premium audio processing features that boost engagement, watchability — and ultimately, increase the value of your product.

Achieve professional results with ease

Creating great-sounding content takes time, costs money, and requires manual processing. When your team doesn’t have the resources to process all your content, our APIs can help apply the right amount of processing with just a few lines of code — quickly and cost-effectively.

This is especially important in podcasting or radio show content where different sound elements are introduced. Our APIs support mixed media to differentiate between speech and music. As a result, we’re able to level out pre-recorded intros and outros, audio across ads, unique speakers, and music — reducing listener fatigue and elevating the listening experience.

Create differentiation

Leading podcast and content production platforms know that in order for podcasters and online content creators to be successful, their content needs to meet higher standards. Help your customers achieve professional results and offer a differentiated service with Dolby.io’s APIs.

Simply integrate our APIs into your platform and workflow to offer one-click media enhancement of recorded media files to your customers. Stand out from the competition and introduce a new source of revenue.

Customer Success

SquadCast’s new Cloud Studio for podcasters boosts quality with Dolby.io

SquadCast is the leading podcast recording service to offer Dolby.io integration and progressive uploading. Dolby.io noise cancellation makes all the remote guests in a podcast sound as if they are in the same room by dynamically adjusting the audio signal.
Read More

Soundwave integrates Dolby.io to enhance audio quality across the app

Soundwave’s 60-second social audio clips, called Waves, are now enhanced with Dolby.io, through integration of Dolby.io Media Processing APIs.
Read More

Popular use cases

Recorded content enhancement and distribution

Audio and video content broadcasting

1:1 podcast or radio show interviews

Content capture for post-processing

Live interview capture

Mobile content capture

The intimate magic of audio, as a medium, only happens when the physical distance melts away, and podcast hosts and guests feel like they’re in the same room. Dolby.io helps us dissolve the distance of remote recording.

Zach Moreno

CEO, SquadCast

Now, users don’t even have to think about where they are or how close they are to their phone — Dolby.io APIs do all of the heavy lifting to bring the audio quality up to where it needs to be.

Dan Ndombe

Co-founder and CEO, SoundWave

Dolby.io allows our users to save time and maximize their creative possibilities in post-production.

Zach Moreno

CEO, SquadCast

SECURITY

Secure, reliable, and scalable

We remove the complexity of building a communications solution while ensuring security and compliance, including access to a global infrastructure. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

The Dolby difference

Dolby has revolutionized the science of sight and sound through innovative research and engineering. Right out-of-the-box, your users can experience Dolby-quality sound in your apps through the power of Dolby Voice®. Dolby Voice® is an award-winning audio communications technology backed by decades of expertise in sound signal processing.

Reliable and scalable

Our network resilience and random loss distribution capabilities help to maintain audio quality between users even in the most challenging network conditions. Our mixing solution processes over 15 billion minutes annually with conference providers such as BlueJeans and British Telecom.

Secure and compliant

From encryption and security certification to our commitment to a secure environment, Dolby.io delivers a communication service that you can trust. Dolby.io is GDPR, HIPAA, and SOC-2 compliant.

Resources

Explore additional content

Developer

Introducing the Dolby.io Media Transcode API

The Transcode API provides another powerful tool from Dolby.io to help you understand, improve, and distribute media …

Jayson DeLancey

Developer Relations

Developer

Create Audio Podcasts from Video By Using a Transcode API in Post-Production

Learn to produce audio-only mp3s from recorded mp4 videos as a podcasting tool use case.

Jayson DeLancey

Developer Relations

Developer

Dolby.io Streaming API with Millicast at SXSW 2022

Dolby.io showed off our new Streaming API at South by Southwest 2022 using our acquisition of Millicast. …

Griffin Solot-Kehl

Developer Advocate

Communications

Using Kotlin to Create Your First Audio Voice Call on Android with Dolby.io

Learn how to use Kotlin to build an Android application that supports Voice Calls.

Denize Ignacio

Developer Relations

Developer

Using Music Mastering on “Take Me Out to the Ball Game”

In this guide we explore how to algorithmically remaster the 1908 baseball anthem “Take Me Out to …

Braden Riggs

Developer Advocate

Get started

Achieve professional-sounding results

No credit card to start. Get a $15 credit just for signing up.

Start building for free Start building for free
Contact sales

Keep a good thing going

Get the latest news, events, and product updates from the Dolby.io team.
